attributes.additional_details:
There are plans by the council to sell off greenbelt land around Whiston in Merseyside to build 1500 houses
This land is used frequently by the residents of whiston and the surrounding areas for recreational purposes it is also home to numerous forms of wildlife we believe that the greenbeltland should be kept this way for future generations to enjoy and not to cover it under tons of concrete and lost forever help us save this little bit of greenery left around the whiston area by signing this petition thank you
